thread.title: Singapore Central Bank Eases Policy on Soft Economic Growth
thread.title_full: Singapore Central Bank Eases Policy on Soft Economic Growth - WSJ

author: Gaurav Raghuvanshi
title: Singapore Central Bank Eases Policy on Soft Economic Growth
text:
SINGAPORE—The Monetary Authority of Singapore on Wednesday eased its currency policy, citing a softer outlook for the global economy since its last review in April.
The central bank said in its half-yearly monetary policy statement that it will “slightly” reduce the rate of appreciation of the Singapore dollar against a basket of currencies of the nation’s main trading partners.
